page.title: 12ROXWELL CATTERY
page.content: The cattery at Roxwell is quite small. The owner, Tony Dobson first lived in the countryside and grew fond of animals, then he went to work in industry. However he disliked it so moved back into the country and bought the business.There are 35 cats at the cattery and you have to hold a licence to say the cat has had all of its required innoculations before you can leave your cat there. The cats have either inside or outside runs depending on personal preference of the owner. The types of food they are given depend on their state of health for an ill cat would be given food with increased Vitamin C. The cats are fed a number of different meals in a day and the number varies according to the age of the cat.
